mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDERNO ,s.title as serviceName ,o.PERSONID , o.PERSONIDCARD , o.PERSONNAME ,o.STATUS ,o.CREATEDTIME ,o.UPDATEDTIME ,o.completionTime FROM T_ORDER o JOIN t_service s ON o.servicename = s.name WHERE o.userId = #{userId} AND o.status = #{status}

SELECT o.ORDERNO ,s.title as serviceName ,o.PERSONID ,o.PERSONIDCARD , o.PERSONNAME ,o.STATUS ,o.requestData ,o.CREATEDTIME ,o.UPDATEDTIME , o.completionTime FROM T_ORDER o JOIN t_service s ON o.servicename = s.name WHERE o.orderNo = #{orderNo}
